name: Velocity Tracker
description:
Controls:

Arrows/WASD - Move

Space - jump

Click - Shoot

How to Play:

You are a lone elf who is surrounded by ghosts!

But thankfully, elves are known to have a sixth sense - they can see invisible things only when they are moving!

Shoot as many ghosts as you can with your gun (idk why) before you die.

Context:

This game was made in 4 hours for the 2022 triple trijam because i am going on holiday lol.
